T02TD2246E:136b-1: pradznyo p'a ya be ya panytsa /
T02TD2246E:136b-3: thabs dang shes rab rtse ba lnga pa /
T02TD2246E:136b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2246E:136b-5: rab tu snang ba'i mchog rtse ba //
T02TD2246E:136b-8: stong nyid yod pa'i 'dod tsam ma //
T02TD2246E:136b-9: stong nyid shin tu mchog rtse ba'i //
T02TD2246E:136b-10: gang gi lus ni dpe med pa //
T02TD2246E:136b-11: gal te brgyal tha dad gyur //
T02TD2246E:137a-2: de phyir dogs pa khyo shug gnyis //
T02TD2246E:137a-3: bla ma dam pa'i spyan sngar gnas //
T02TD2246E:137a-4: gnyug ma'i rtse ba de dang de'i //
T02TD2246E:137a-5: lhan cig skyes pa'i rtse bar mdzod //
T02TD2246E:137a-6: ae ma'o bla ma dam pa mkhas //
T02TD2246E:137a-8: gnyug ma dbyer med dmigs pa med //
T02TD2246E:137a-9: bla na med pa gnyi ga ste //
T02TD2246E:137a-10: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD2246E:137a-11: mtha' gnyis dag ni rnam par spangs //
T02TD2246E:137a-12: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2246E:137a-13: rang bzhin med pa rtag tu shar //
T02TD2246E:137a-14: thabs dang shes rab rtse ba lnga pa slob dpon aa ba dh'u t'i pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2246E:137a-16: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra p'a ni dang /
T02TD2246E:137a-17: bod kyi lo ts'a ba mtshur dzny'a na a'a ka ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o//
